sources.title: Ten Gladiators
sources.description: 1960 starring Dan Vadis. Set in Rome. Nero's at bat and ten gladiators unite to oppose him.

metadata.Plot: The story of Spartacus and 10 other gladiators who rebelled against the bloody coliseum sports. They escape and are faced at every turn by Roman soldiers bent on taking them back to the Coliseum - dead or alive!
metadata.Writer: Sergio Sollima, Nick Nostro, Alfonso Balcázar
metadata.Actors: Dan Vadis, Helga Liné, Giovanni Di Benedetto
